sentences.en: ...one of the brightest and ablest members of the government.
sentences.cn: …最聪明、最有才能的政府成员之一。

sentences.en: Chantal was lucky to be able to salvage her career.
sentences.cn: 尚塔尔能保住她的事业算是走了运。

sentences.en: Have you been able to have any kind of contact?
He conjectured that some individuals may be able to detect major calamities.
sentences.cn: 他猜测说有些人也许能够察觉重大灾难。

sentences.en: He was never able to get past the border guards.
sentences.cn: 他从未能够通过边防哨兵的检查。

sentences.en: I was able to get on with my work without interruption.
sentences.cn: 我可以不受打扰继续我的工作了。

sentences.en: I’ve always wanted to be able to speak Japanese.
In her place I wouldn't have been able to resist it.
sentences.cn: 如果我是她就可能抗拒不了。

sentences.en: Individualists say that you should be able to wear what you want.
sentences.cn: 个人主义者认为人应该想穿什么就穿什么。

sentences.en: It would be nice to be able to afford to retire earlier.
sentences.cn: 无后顾之忧而能提早退休当是件幸事。

sentences.en: Magistrates will be able to attach conditions when juveniles are remanded.
sentences.cn: 地方法官将可以在少年犯送押时提出附加条件。

sentences.en: one of my more able students
sentences.cn: 我班上能力比较强的学生之一

sentences.en: Smith prides himself on being able to organise his own life.
sentences.cn: 史密斯对能够把自己的生活安排得井井有条感到很得意。

sentences.en: The gym can be used by both able-bodied and disabled people.
sentences.cn: 这家健身房健全和残障人士都可使用。

sentences.en: The RAF recognized him as an out-standingly able engineer.
sentences.cn: 英国皇家空军表彰他是一名非常能干的机械师。

sentences.en: Today he was able to focus his message exclusively on the economy.
sentences.cn: 今天他得以将主题全部集中在经济方面。

sentences.en: Wallcoverings and floors should be able to withstand steam and splashes.
sentences.cn: 墙面材料和地板都应该能耐热汽且防水。

sentences.en: We were not able to meet the deadline because of manufacturing delays.
sentences.cn: 因为制造方面的延误，我们没能赶上最后期限。
